info.name: A Warm Place
info.description:
A theme I found a while ago and edited, so not really mine but I dunno what the original was. I use chrome, so that's what I know this looks like in.

If it doesn't come up automatically, this should affect urls on the domain tumblr.com. I think I got it to work right now, but if not let me know.
info.additionalInfo:
1/22/2013--- Fixed a number of things and changed the background, thanks to the wonderful
Blue Mood Tumblr Theme (TakingCasualties) / CC BY 3.0
2/3/2013 used the .plexi lines of this style (http://userstyles.org/styles/68778/mass-effect-tumblr-theme) to get rid of that stupid blue background on the new reblog/new post screen.
